extends java.lang.Object

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void doOperation(int choice)
      Call the method that run the option chose by the user
      pre: The choice has to be an integer post:
      int readOption()
      Read and save an option that the user chose
      pre: The option has to be representated by an integer post: Return the integer choice
      java.lang.String readPlaylist()
      Create and save a new playlist
      pre: The playlist name has to be a text string pre: The users that will be added for the private and restricted playlist have to be already created post: Create the new playlist and show a message
      java.lang.String readToAddSong()
      Create and share a new song
      pre: The user that will be used to create the song has to be already registered pre: The genre has to be representated by an integer post: Create and share the new song and post: Update the number of shared songs of the user that created the song
      java.lang.String readToAddSongPlaylist()
      Save a new song in playlist on the application
      pre: The playlist has to be already created pre: The song has to be already shared post: Add the song to the playlist and show a message
      java.lang.String readToGiveAccess()
      Give acces to restricted playlist for a new user
      pre: The restricted playlist has to be already created pre: The number of users with acces has to be less than 5 pre: The user that will have access has to be already registered post: Give access to the user and show a message
      java.lang.String readToRatingPlaylist()
      Rate a public playlist
      pre: The public playlist has to be already created pre: The qualification has to be an integer post: Save the qualification and show a message
      java.lang.String readUser()
      Create and register a new user in the application
      pre: The username has to be a text string without spaces pre: The password has to be a text string pre: The age has to be an integer post: Create the new user and show a message
      void showLogo()
      Show the application's logo
      pre: post: Print the logo of the application
      void showMenu()
      Main menu of the application
      pre: The user cant choose an option that's not on the menu post: The user choose an option
      void startProgram()
      Run the whole application
      pre: The option has to be an integer post: Run the program
